Posts.EditableText: When loading a game from QDK is loads Quest3.  uninstalling Quest3 causes Quest4 to uninstall, but doesn't remove it from the actual program files directory...
Posts.HTML: When loading a game from QDK is loads Quest3.  uninstalling Quest3 causes Quest4 to uninstall, but doesn't remove it from the actual program files directory...

Posts.EditableText: It will load using whatever Quest is associated with ASL files. If you want to associate Quest 4 with ASL files, go to its Options window and click the "Restore File Associations" button.
Posts.HTML: It will load using whatever Quest is associated with ASL files. If you want to associate Quest 4 with ASL files, go to its Options window and click the "Restore File Associations" button.
